EmailTemplate.description: Survey sent to members who were final confirmed to attend Dodgers on July 4th.
EmailTemplate.name: MHL Dodgers survey
EmailTemplate.subject: IAVA's July 4th Dodgers game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
On behalf of myself, the Membership team, and all of the IAVA staff, thank you for attending the July 4th Los Angeles Dodgers game as part of IAVA and Miller High Life's "Give a Veteran a Piece of the High Life" program.
The night was a home run for veterans and their guests, as we brought together nearly 500 veterans and their families for a memorable night full of baseball and fireworks! Although the Dodgers couldn't beat the New York Mets we sincerely hope you, your friends and your family enjoyed the event. Your feedback is critical to the success of these events, and I would appreciate if you could take a few minutes to fill out a survey about your High Life Experience by logging on to <http://iava.org/july-4th-dodgers-game>. By filling out the survey you will be helping IAVA improve future events - plus, you will be automatically entered to win a copy of HBO's celebrated mini-series "The Pacific."
Sincerely,
Anthony
P.S. If you took any pictures at the game that you are willing to share, please send those to Rucksack@iava.org or be sure to tag IAVA in your photo albums on Facebook!
Anthony Pike Membership Coordinator Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA) 292 Madison Avenue, 10th Floor New York, NY 10017 (212) 982-9699 www.iava.org Follow us on Twitter: @IAVA
